name: CyberCrow
description:
In a dark and oppressive future, where cyber corporations control everything, Corvo has a simple task: get vengeance to the police that betrayed him, and make them pay.

Enjoy this take on the hack n slash genre where every you don't have melee weapons, and instead have to rely on a pistol and shotgun to get the work done.

Parry your enemies, aim at them, and blast them away until nothing remains.


CONTROLS

  • W,A,S,D: Move the character
  • R: Dash
  • T: Lock-on to enemy in your range
  • Q/E: Lock-on to the next enemy to the left/right
  • Tab: Change selected weapon
  • Right click: Parry
  • Left click: Shoot

MADE BY:

-Anabel Jesús Lorenzo (Programmer)

-Iván Ramos Benito (Artist)

-Aaron Miranda Gómez (Programmer & Sound Designer)

-Xabier Goenaga Urkiola (Artist)
